projects.name: Active Directory Home Lab
projects.description: Set up a virtualized Active Directory environment to manage user authentication, accounts, and organizational policies. Configured DNS and DHCP services for automated IP allocation and smooth network communication.

projects.name: Real-Time Transit Data Collection App
projects.description: Developed an interactive map with clustering functionality using Mapbox GL JS, improving visualization of bus stops. Implemented a rating and feedback system for users to share experiences on accessibility and shelter availability.
